/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
